description: Interactive tutorial sequence guiding new players through room placement, resources, inhabitants, and connections with skip and replay support

userStories.title: Tutorial State Management
userStories.description: As a developer, I want tutorial state tracked so that the game knows whether to show the tutorial and which step the player is on
acceptanceCriteria: A TutorialState type tracks: isComplete, isSkipped, currentStep, hasSeenTutorial
Tutorial state is persisted via localStorageSignal
On first launch, hasSeenTutorial is false
Completing or skipping sets isComplete or isSkipped to true
Unit tests verify state transitions
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Tutorial Trigger on First Launch
userStories.description: As a new player, I want the tutorial to start automatically when I first play the game
acceptanceCriteria: When the player reaches the game-play page with hasSeenTutorial: false, the tutorial starts
The tutorial overlay appears with a welcome message and Start Tutorial / Skip buttons
Choosing Start Tutorial begins Step 1
Choosing Skip marks the tutorial as skipped and proceeds to free play
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Step 1 - Room Placement
userStories.description: As a new player, I want to learn how to place a room so that I can start building my dungeon
acceptanceCriteria: A tooltip highlights the room placement button/area
Tutorial text explains how to select and place a room
The player must place at least one room to advance
Other UI elements are dimmed or disabled during this step
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Step 2 - Resource Generation
userStories.description: As a new player, I want to learn about resource generation so that I understand how rooms produce resources
acceptanceCriteria: A tooltip points to the resource display
The player must wait for at least one resource tick to see generation
After a resource tick, the tutorial highlights changed values and advances
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Step 3 - Inhabitants
userStories.description: As a new player, I want to learn about inhabitants so that I understand dungeon population
acceptanceCriteria: The tutorial provides a free starting inhabitant
A tooltip highlights the inhabitant assignment area
The player must assign the inhabitant to a room to advance
After assignment, the tutorial shows the production increase
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Step 4 - Connections
userStories.description: As a new player, I want to learn about room connections so that I understand how rooms link together
acceptanceCriteria: The tutorial prompts the player to place a second room
A tooltip highlights the hallway/connection tool
The player must create a connection between two rooms to advance
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Tutorial Completion, Skip, and Replay
userStories.description: As a player, I want to complete, skip, or replay the tutorial at any time
acceptanceCriteria: After completing all steps, a summary overlay recaps key concepts with a Start Playing button
A Skip Tutorial button is visible during all tutorial steps
A Replay Tutorial button exists in the settings/options menu
Replay resets tutorial state and starts from Step 1 without affecting game state
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
Typecheck passes
